channel.title: How do i change the massive size of the ice barrage? it is HUGE ATM!
channel.description: how do i change the size back to normal, like in normal rs? and if this helps its pimpscape..

item.title: How do i change the massive size of the ice barrage? it is HUGE ATM!
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

[quote=“Mod Nate, post:20, topic:75708”]im going to teach a math lesson…

369 = 3"69" now remove the three at now we must break down the other 2 numbers = 69 = F U N =

F = Fucking
U = u
N = Nude

This now concludes the following the worrect answer is 69 to the 2 power =)[/quote]

Have to spam kid?

item.title: How do i change the massive size of the ice barrage? it is HUGE ATM!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

im going to teach a math lesson…

369 = 3"69" now remove the three at now we must break down the other 2 numbers = 69 = F U N =

F = Fucking
U = u
N = Nude

This now concludes the following the worrect answer is 69 to the 2 power =)

item.title: How do i change the massive size of the ice barrage? it is HUGE ATM!
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

sigh sigh and sigh again now go to client.java

search for

public void setequipment

go to below and add this somewhere

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) { // Ancient staff playerSE = 809; playerSEA = 806; playerSEW = 1146; playerSER = 1210; }

next search for getweaponani

and somewhere add

public int GetStandAnim(int id) { if(id == 1305 || id == 1379 || id == 3204 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563) // staves + d long and most other weps with str8 up emote { return 809; }

also search for get runani

add this in it

public int GetStandAnim(int id) { if(id == 1305 || id == 1379 || id == 3204 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563) // staves + d long and most other weps with str8 up emote { return 809; }

and in getwalkani

public int GetStandAnim(int id) { if(id == 1305 || id == 1379 || id == 3204 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563) // staves + d long and most other weps with str8 up emote { return 809; }

voila now u have all stafs working and some other weapons enjoy

item.source: How do i change the massive size of the ice barrage? it is HUGE ATM!

item.title: How do i change the massive size of the ice barrage? it is HUGE ATM!
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

all on ice? ok here you go

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);  
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0);
//hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
//stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}

and…

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] > 124)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(565)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(39);
startAnimation(1979);
attackPlayersWithin(370, 39, 10); 
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);  
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}

so…thats all of it[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 12:04:11 AM[/size][hr]umm hello? im echoing in my own post…i got the posts…osts…osts…os…

Read full topic
